sub_title: Global Process Governance, Forecast to Plan & Procure to Pay

profile_positions.title: Global Process Governance Owner, Forecast to Plan & Procure to Pay

profile_positions.description:
•	Led program management for design and deployment for global inventory planning and management, aligned with SAP deployment 
o	Drove creation of project timeline and resource transition plans 
o	Collaborated with thought-leaders and subject matter experts on future state business processes and key performance indicators 
o	Created franchise deployment timelines and readiness assessment processes 

•	Completed deployment schedule for Global Demand Planning and Global Inventory Visibility projects – on time, under budget 
o	Managed business deliverables and ensured alignment across 16 divisions and over 100 end-users 
o	Facilitated key issue resolution, decision-making sessions to drive global standardization across divisional stakeholders 
o	Developed strong relationships with global businesses to ensure business alignment, clear communication and resource needs
profile_positions.title: Sr. Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
•  Created IBP implementation and roll-out strategy by business unit with strong partnership and engagement from key stakeholders 
•  Facilitated organization change to support S&OP structure:  creation of demand planning team, transferring demand planning responsibilities from plants, and standardization across global business units
•  Coordinated and led monthly meeting encompassing  83% of Endoscopy 2013 global sales, highlighting key risks in demand and supply planning and gaining consensus on key business decisions 
•  Co-lead supply planning process excellence team with global participants to standardize metrics and high-level business process flows
profile_positions.title: Integrated Business Planning Manager

profile_positions.description:
•  Within the Arthroscopy, General Surgery businesses, oversaw approximately $77M annual purchase order receipts, average inventory of $17.5M, and materials management of over 1,000 finished good items
•  Oversaw reduction in production inventory by $5.8M from peak in 2009 to yr. end
•  Trained and provided functional guidance and support for buyers and planners; promoted four team members in 2010
•  Assisted in key supplier negotiations on distribution conditions, safety stock levels/agreements and cost
profile_positions.title: Materials Manager

profile_positions.description:
•  Supported forecasting process for Endoscopy division; demand planning accuracy improved approx. 10% from Q1-08 to Q4-08
•  Oversaw implementation of upgraded forecasting module, Demantra, within Oracle ERP system
•  Set IT priorities to address system and reporting issues for the materials team
profile_positions.title: Associate Planning Manager

profile_positions.description:
•  Responsible for engagement and performance of receiving, stockroom, and material handling teams
•  Created new metrics to analyze overall capacity and drive team performance; improved average bin processing time by approximately 35%
•  Contributed to achievement of 2007 Distribution Excellence award for Medsurg Operations Congress
profile_positions.title: Distribution Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
•  Responsible for issuance and physical flow of materials to production floor 
•  Implemented significant process improvements in work order scheduling and material delivery routes
•  Analyzed material handler capacity and workload distribution among personnel and improved service across production teams 
•  Assisted in the creation of Lean Academy training program as well as created and implemented inventory replenishment and safety stock policies for the division
profile_positions.title: Material Flow Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
•  Secured over $500K in cost reduction through negotiations with key suppliers
•  Managed product lines totaling over $7.5M in inventory
•  Reduced 9 inventory days from 2005 through 2006, with several product launches and line extensions
•  Led materials responsibilities in key product launches for Urology / Gynecology markets
profile_positions.title: Purchasing Analyst
